column5: Figured that I better throw in at least one fishing report for this summer. Been out a few times but didn't ever remember the camera. Mixed success through the summer months but did end up with some walleye for supper on occasion. My wife Karen and son Alex and I went out before it got scorchingly hot yesterday morning. Bagged 2 pickerel on the first two casts and said yahoo I'm on it today. Spoke too soon as usual, no more for me. Karen picked up one more pickerel before we left. She also caught a sheephead and me a sunfish to toss back. A friend in a boat nearby caught a dandy smallmouth but didn't take a picture. I would guess about a 20 to 23 ". We fished a little over an hour before it got too hot. May give a go this coming weekend as it's supposed to cool off some.
Glad yer getting out Bernie! Very happy to see a fishin report from you... btw  -  I know that spot! LOL HH
Looks like you got some nice weather and quality fishin' time in Bernie!!!
Isn't that the steeples in the backround???? Nice day to fish Bud.   Art
